TopicTitle: How do you get more contracts?

Articles.Content:
I want to get more contracts but the game isn't offering any. I have a fully-upgraded Mission Control, so I have unlimited space

Edited November 27, 2017 by Fireheart318

How many contracts do you currently have accepted?

I think you can only have so many going at once even at max upgrade.

That's been my experience with it at least. As soon as you start completing them more will pop up to fill in the spaces.

2 minutes ago, Rocket In My Pocket said:

How many contracts do you currently have accepted?

I think you can only have so many going at once even at max upgrade.

That's been my experience with it at least. As soon as you start completing them more will pop up to fill in the spaces.

That's pretty much the issue. I heard somewhere that it was possible to change something to get even more, but I can't figure out what it was

Just now, Fireheart318 said:

That's pretty much the issue. I heard somewhere that it was possible to change something to get even more, but I can't figure out what it was

Hmm, I see.

Prolly something in one of the games config .ini's.

No idea personally, hopefully someone who knows will clue us in.
